import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import {Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import UserDetails from "./UserDetails"; import { ToursContext } from "../../context/ToursContext"; import ProgressBar from "../../components/ProgressBar"; import Tours from '../../DB/Tuscany.json'; export default function BookingDetails() { const {id} = useParams(); const {toursData} = useContext(ToursContext); return ( <>

When you will visit?

    Select Your Tickets

  • Free for kids under 6 and disabled visitors (74%+)
  • Pregnant women, families with strollers, and visitors on crutches can buy priority tickets at the venue

    Adult(18+)

    {toursData.price}

    Child (6-17)

    • With valid ID
    • Only in combination with: Adult (18+)
<>

    Infant (0-5)

    • Only in combination with: Adult (18+)
<>
); } export const Counter = () => { const [ticket, setTicket] = useState(0); const {updateToursData} = useContext(ToursContext); const increaseTicket = () => setTicket(ticket + 1) updateToursData(setTicket) ; const decreaseTicket = () => setTicket(ticket > 0 ? ticket - 1 : 0) updateToursData(setTicket) ; const handleTicketChange = (amount) => { setTicket(increaseTicket || decreaseTicket) updateToursData(setTicket) } return(<>
) } const TicketOverview = () => { const {toursData} = useContext(ToursContext); return( <>

) }
